location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Aboo [Ābu] to Leslie Saunders, Ajmere [Ajmer]; Captain Thomas Cadell, Political Agent Ulwa [Alwar]; Captain Arthur Roberts, Eastern States, Bhurtpoor [Bharatpur]; Colonel William Beynon, Political Agent Jeypoor [Jaipur]; Colonel Alexander Hutchinson, Political Agent, Meywar [Mewār]; Major Charles Walker, Jodpoor [Jodhpur]; Colonel William Carnell, Erinpoora [Erinpura]; Captain James Berkeley, Political Agent Harowlee [Haroli] Deolee [ Deoli]

mods.abstract: Letter regarding a Durbar that the Viceroy (Thomas George Baring, 2nd Baron Northbrook) intends to hold around the beginning of November and requesting details on which Chief's within Rajpootana [Rājasthān] may wish to attend.
